about_the_game:
Terra is an atmospheric real-time strategy game that combines 4X elements with a procedural universe. Wage war, engage in diplomacy, and discover hidden characters and the mysteries of the universe through the eyes of one of 5 unique factions.

COLONIZE PLANETS

After global environmental and political collapse on Earth, a mass exodus has forced humanity to splinter off into factions based on ideology. Find a new home for your faction's first pioneers and grow your influence by expanding to nearby habitable planets, setting up outposts on barren moons, or risking it all to find precious resources in the hazardous unknown.

CONDUCT DIPLOMACY

Those who left Earth did so to create a better future, but don't always agree on what it takes to get there. Engage in direct diplomacy with other leaders to maintain peace, or wage all out war. Dock with neutral space stations, trade resources with independent organizations, and negotiate with pirates to ensure the survival of your faction.

WAGE WAR

Go head to head with your enemies in fully simulated space combat with real time physics, navigate through asteroid fields to escape enemies, and orchestrate all out planetary assaults with drop ships to attack ground forces.

EXPLORE IDEOLOGY

Cybernetic enhancements? Planetary ecology? Libertarian industrialism? Take advantage of your faction's unique strengths and weaknesses and balance your social dynamics to forge your path forward.

Terra is still early in development, but stay tuned for more updates!
